turn.0: Hi, I'm your automated assistant. I can answer your questions about Two-Face.
turn.1: What is the relation between Two-Face and Plague?
turn.2: In the end, Batman injects the cure, but it has no effect on Harvey, since it is really a sedative and knocks Two-Face out.
turn.3: What happened when he was cured?
turn.4: In the end, Batman takes Two-Face back to Gotham.
turn.5: Are there any other interesting aspects about this article?
turn.6: In the "Watchmen" sequel "Doomsday Clock", Two-Face is among the villains that attend the underground meeting held by the Riddler that talks about the Superman Theory.
turn.7: What was his role in the Arkham Asylum?
turn.8: In "", while Harley Quinn's Gang of Harleys is trying to find information about the Man-Bat, they run into Two-Face while at Arkham Asylum, where he makes threats towards the group.
turn.9: What happened before he became Two-Face?
turn.10: Before his transformation into Two-Face, Harvey Dent had a successful career as Gotham's upstanding district attorney, proficient in nearly all matters pertaining to criminal law.
turn.12: Following his disfigurement, he became obsessed with the number two and the concept of duality, and thus staged crimes centered around the number two—such as robbing buildings with '2' in the address or staging events that will take place at 10:22 p.m. (2222 in military time).
